title: testingelcrypto
author: testingelcrypto
content: According to this site : https://iancoleman.io/bip39/ rolling a dice only gets 1.67bits is this correct?

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: A 6-sided die gives log2 6 = 2.58 bits of entropy.I didn't have the patience to explore the issue in depth, but someone was saying that the way the site processes the dice rolls results in only 1.67 bits.
